#summary This wiki describe the ProtFam dataset on the Desktop Tool

= Protein Families =

The figure shows [SearchTab Search Tab] using the !ProtFam as main dataset. 

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/34.jpg

In this dataset the quick search will be performed over the *!UniRef ID* (!UniRef50_Q6VAB6) and *Name* fields including the use of simple [http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/pattern-matching.html SQL regular expressions]. 

There is no possibility to use other biological objects as [Constrains Constrains] on the *!ProtFam* search tab.

The [SearchTab Search Tab] will produce a new [ListTab List Tab], next figure, 
with the obtained results.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/35.jpg

The UniRef complete description window
